record.field: The Account "%(account)s" has configured the next Analytic Roots as Required and Forbidden at once: %(roots)s.
The Account "%(account)s" has configured the next Analytic Roots as Required and Optional at once: %(roots)s.
The Account "%(account)s" has configured the next Analytic Roots as Forbidden and Optional at once: %(roots)s.
The Account Move "%(move)s" can't be posted because it doesn't have analytic lines for the next required analytic hierachies: %(roots)s.
The Account Move "%(move)s" can't be posted because the Analytic Lines of hierachy "%(root)s" related to Move Line "%(line)s" are not valid.
The Move Line "%(line)s" is related to the Account "%(account)s" which is not configured for all Analytic hierarchies
The Analytic Line "%(line)s" is related to an Account Move Line of Account "%(account)s" which has the analytics forbidden for the Line\'s Analytic hierarchy.
